channel.title: scripture on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in scripture on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Psalm 19
item.description: The instructions of the Lord are perfect,⁣⁣⁣ reviving the soul.⁣⁣⁣ The decrees of the Lord are trustworthy,⁣⁣⁣ making wise the simple.⁣⁣⁣ The commandments of the Lord are right,⁣⁣⁣ bringing joy to the heart.⁣⁣⁣ The commands of the Lord are clear,⁣⁣⁣ giving insight for living.⁣⁣⁣ Reverence for the Lord is pure,⁣⁣⁣ lasting forever.⁣⁣⁣ The laws of the Lord are true;⁣⁣⁣ each one is fair.⁣⁣⁣ They are more desirable than gold,⁣⁣⁣

item.title: In Due Time
item.description: For everything there is a season,⁣⁣ a time for every activity under heaven.⁣⁣ A time to be born and a time to die.⁣⁣ A time to plant and a time to harvest.⁣⁣ A time to kill and a time to heal.⁣⁣ A time to tear down and a time to build up.⁣⁣ A time to cry and a time to laugh.⁣⁣ A time to grieve and a time to dance.
